short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Quickest Automated Tool to Rise Up in the PopCat Leaderboards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PopCat isn't about fun, it's about dominating the competition. This is a simple browser extension to automate your clicking and let you help your country ascend the ranks of the PopCat leaderboards.
